Personality: Kyle is usually cocky and quick to think, but when times get tough, his more...sadistic side comes out. Even if he smells pretty bad, he hides it pretty well. Kyle starts to yell whenever he gets stressed or in the heat of the battle.

111.title: Opponent

1111.content: I smirk as I watch you enter the ring. "Well would you look at this? The first peson brave enough to challenge me and he hides his face under a hood! Tell you what, you surrender to me now and I'll let you go. If you don't..." I throw out a pokeball, releasing my Arcanine, Nova, "you're going to regret it."
1111.title: Fight me!

11111.content: "Hah! Yeah, right. You're not going to beat me so easily." I smirk from under my hood. I grab a pokeball from my belt and throw it, sending out Jake, my Dewott. "Don't think this is going to be a piece of cake. This Dewott's more than you think."
11111.title: Continue

choices: Gets squished under a fire dog butt
111111.content: I can't help but laugh, "awwww, you think a wittle type advantage is gonna keep you from smewing my feet when this is over! How adorable... Nova! Smother that little rat under your butt and gas him within an inch of his life!" Nova nods and charges straight for your Dewott who...
111111.title: First battle!

1111111.content:
I simply snap my fingers, and Jake swiftly sidesteps the Arcanine. "I don't even need to give him orders. Jake, just give her a whiff of your farts!" He nods and dodges again, this time jumping on top of the Arcanine and sitting on top of the fire dog's head, letting out brassy poots. He moves down to her face, and lets out a noxious fart right in Nova's face.

"Hah! Too easy." I say, chuckling.
1111111.title: Dodges her

11111111.content: Growling, I rush forwards, take off one of my shoes, and shove my socked foot in your pokemon's face. He gets a whiff and immediately goes cross eyed from the stench. I take the opportunity to shove him off of Nova, letting her stand back up. She shakes her head to clear out the smell before rushing the dazed Dewott. She stops when she gets right above him, her huge body looming over his. She turns around, and hovers her butt over your Dewott's head, shaking it tauntingly.
11111111.title: Can she get away?

111111112.content: Dang it! I had to do something or I would soon be down, 3 to 4! I lift up my right arm to my chest, showing the now glowing 4-pointed star, and suddenly, Nova fell backwards, giving Jake time to escape. He quickly jumped on top and sat right on Nova's face, letting out a barrage of awful smelling gas in her face. "Hah!" I smirk. I wasn't about to use up my gas just yet, I'm waiting for a better time...the dazed Arcanine could only struggle as Jake farted again in her face.
111111112.title: Jake escapes!

1111111121.content: Unfortunately for me, Nova was still dazed from the thrashing you'd given her. Jake's farts make short work of her and she quickly passes out from the noxious fumes. Growling, I return her to her pokeball. "Don't think you've won yet!" I toss a pokeball and out comes my Gardevoir, Gleam. You decide to...
1111111121.title: Nova passes out, 4 to 3!

11111111212.content: There was no way Jake could take down two Pokemon in one go. "Come back Jake, I might need you later!" He returns to his pokeball, and I taunt as I grab my next one. I throw it to the arena, and out comes Flash, my Jolteon. The smell in the area slowly becomes thicker, and I say "If that's all you got, this match is pretty much over. Go and shove a paw in that Gardevoir's mouth, Flash." He nods, and dashes in at a tremendous speed. Gleam...
11111111212.title: Switch him out

111111112122.content: While holding her nose to block out the disgusting stench in the air, Gleam raises her free hand and your Jolteon immediately stops in his tracks. Surrounded by psychic energy that blocks his body odor in addition to moving him, Flash is lifted up and brought right in front of Gleam's face. "Alright Gleam, hypnotize him!" Gleam giggles as her eyes begin to glow...
111111112122.title: Retaliates!

1111111121221.content: I try to help Flash by jumping in, but I jump back, in fear of being hypnotized myself. "Dammit." I mutter as I see my Jolteon go limp in Gleam's grasp. "Get out of there!" I shout at him, but he barely moved to my command. He was fully hypnotized now, and there was nothing I could do about it. I merely grunted lowly.
1111111121221.title: Flash is hypnotized

choices: You do something to stop this
11111111212211.content: Gleam giggles lightly as she sets Flash on the ground, not removing the psychic barrier blocking his stench of course. I look to Gleam and say, "so, will he obey me yet?" Gleam nods and sits down on the ground. "Good. Hey mutt! I want you to sniff Gleam's feet until you pass out!" The Jolteon blankly nods and walks towards Gleam who presents her sweaty feet to him. He immediately dives in and starts taking huge whiffs of her rank feet.
11111111212211.title: This could be a problem.

choices: It works, Flash gets back up
111111112122112.content: Oh, crap! I'm in trouble! I could smell her feet from here, and they reeked! I telepathically tell Flash "Snap out of it and get back up before you pass out!" and jump into the ring, rushing to Gleam and putting her in a headlock. Her face was really close to my armpit, and as she accidentally takes a whiff, she becomes disoriented and woozy as I push her to the ground. I rush back, saying "Come on, please work...if it doesn't I wasted so much...
111111112122112.title: You do something to stop this

1111111121221122.content: Flash just sat there, still under Gleam's spell, I chuckle at you and say, "really? That was your plan? If you really wanted to snap him out of it, you should have clonked him on the head! But you're too late now!" Gleam shakily stands up as she brings Flash right in front of her face and exhales. "Deep whiffs Mutt!"
1111111121221122.title: It doesn't work...

11111111212211221.content: "Crap." I say, I failed to get you out AND I wasted some of my abilities. I could only grunt and watch as Flash sniffs up every last ounce of the awful halitosis. Soon enough, he takes a last whiff and passes out. I send him back. "This isn't over yet!" I send out an Aerodactyl, who swoops into the air and looms over the Gardevoir.
11111111212211221.title: Continue

choices: You manage to stop her somehow
111111112122112211.content: I figure that Gleam's psychic powers are the way to go against a flying enemy and decide it's best to keep her in the fight. "Alright Gleam, put that fossil back where it belongs... the ground!" Gleam's eyes glow as she attempts to slam your Aerodactyl to the floor. A light purple aura begins to form around him and...
111111112122112211.title: Keep Gleam in

1111111121221122112.content: I act quickly, using the same method with my four sided star. It begins to glow, and next thing you know, Gleam breaks eye contact and is slammed face first into the ground. Aero quickly swoops back down as I taunt "Ooh, that's gotta hurt! Aero, let's hurry up and knock out this Gardevoir, all right?" The Aerodactyl took no time in exhaling deeply in the Gardevoir's face and wrapping his wings around Gleam. He left a small opening at the top in which he breathed continuously into the nasty chamber.
1111111121221122112.title: You manage to stop her somehow

11111111212211221121.content: I grimace as Gleam quickly faints from the overpowering stench of Aero's wings and breath. Recalling her to her pokeball, I scowl at you, "hmph, you're pretty good. But even if you beat this next guy, my last pokemon's going to slaughter you!" With that, I throw out Spectre's pokeball, "Spectre! Tackle that thing before it has a chance to fly away!" Spectre starts rushing towards your Aerodactyl who is still in the ground and...
11111111212211221121.title: Continue

choices: It fails to get him off as he climbs up
111111112122112211211.content: I bark at my Aerodactyl "Aero! Into the air!" Aero notices, swooping into the air quickly before Spectre could catch him. However, he notices that Spectre was hanging onto his tail! "Gas that Pokemon and make him fall!" I watch as Aero lets out a long fart and stops ascending, flapping in the air.
111111112122112211211.title: He flies away

1111111121221122112111.content: Spectre gags on the smell but holds on tight to Aero's tail. I smirk, "it'll take more than that to beat us! Spectre! Give him a nice whiff of your paws." Spectre nods and quickly climbs up Aero's tail and onto his back. Once there, he wraps both of his front paws around Aero's head, smothering his face with his disgusting paws.
1111111121221122112111.title: It fails to get him off as he climbs up

choices: Aero falls first from the nasty paw stink.
Spectre falls first from the spinning
11111111212211221121111.content: Aero gagged and retched on the foul smell, flapping his wings wildly and struggling to stay in the air. I use my telepathy again, telling him "Spin in the air! Make Spectre dizzy so he'll let go!". Aero nods, spinning in the air quickly, quickly, he was spinning extremely quickly now, Spectre struggling to hold on. The air around them was now getting fouled by the stench of Spectre's paws and Aero's wings.
11111111212211221121111.title: Continue

choices: Aero passes out and your next pokemon makes short work of Spectre
Aero finds a way to escape
111111112122112211211111.content: Aero quickly stops spinning as the cloying paw stench saps his strength. With a groan, Aero falls to the ground with Spectre landing on top of him. Spectre himself is too dizzy to move, but with his potent paws in Aero's face, he doesn't really need to. However, even if Spectre wins, in his current state your next pokemon will knock him out for sure! A minute passes like this and...
111111112122112211211111.title: Aero falls first from the nasty paw stink.

1111111121221122112111111.content: Aero unwillingly huffed up cheesy paw stink for another minute before passing out. I call him back, and say "I guess this could be our lucky "Chance", huh?" And with that pun, I call out Chance, my Chansey. She stretches, and I say "Let's finish off this Umbreon." She nods, and hurries over to the dazed Spectre. Chance turns him around, and puts half of her foot right into the Umbreon's mouth, while putting her other foot on Spectre's nose. She sits down on the ground, making sure not to crush her opponent, humming happily as she waits for Spectre to pass out. "Heh, looks like your Umbreon is making a good foot cleaner for Chance!"
1111111121221122112111111.title: Aero passes out and your next pokemon makes sho...

11111111212211221121111111.content: I first groan from that terrible pun before groaning again as Spectre is quickly finished off by your Chansey. I return him to his pokeball and say, "heh, I'm impressed, very few people ever force me to use Centigrade but in all my time as a trainer, no one has ever beaten him!" I toss my pokeball into the air and out pops an absolutely disgusting Glaceon. I chuckle and hold my nose as his stench fills the air.
11111111212211221121111111.title: Continue

111111112122112211211111111.content: "U-Ugh!" I say, covering my nose. This Glaceon was, truthfully, THE foulest thing I've ever smelled! How in the hell was I supposed to beat him?! I continue to hold my nose, continuing to gag as I order Chance to wait. Reluctantly, Chance stays in the arena, waiting for the putrid Glaceon to attack. "Dear Arceus, this guy reeks so much!"
111111112122112211211111111.title: Continue

choices: You still have a few tricks up your sleeve
1111111121221122112111111111.content: I smirk, "I told you that you wouldn't be able to beat me. Now I'm going to jave fun watching Centigrade turn you into a fart cushion when I win!" Centigrade rushes forwards and tackles Chance to the ground. He immediately fires an Ice beam, freezing her arms to the floor before resting his front paws on her face. I could tell that both you and your pokemon were having a hard time coping with the stench and laugh an Centigrade's nasty paws quickly sap the strength out of your Chansey.
1111111121221122112111111111.title: Continue

11111111212211221121111111111.content: I couldn't do anything, and frankly, I didn't really want to get involved and get even near this stinkbag. I could simply watch and shout at Chance to get up as she was forced to sniff Glaceon paws. I grunt, I didn't want to be Centigrade's fart cushion, especially if he smells this bad...Chance sniffed a few more times before passing out from the rancid stench. I call her back, and hold out my last pokeball. I pray as hard as I can for Jake to beat Centigrade, and throw him out.
11111111212211221121111111111.title: She quickly passes out

choices: Jake gets the heck outta there!
111111112122112211211111111111.content: I smirk, "oh right. I forgot all about that little weasel of yours. No matter, he's no match for my pride and joy. Centigrade! Show this loser who's boss!" Centigrade smirks and rushes forth, attempting to pin jake under his toxic behind.
111111112122112211211111111111.title: Naw... you're imagining things!

1111111121221122112111111111112.content: "Jake, let's go! Show who's the real loser here!" He nods and dodges smoothly, sidestepping Centigrade's attack. Chuckling, he dodges another one, this time hopping on top of the Glaceon and farting on his head from above, just as he had done with Nova. But this Tiem, his legs were curled up and his feet were dangling right in front of Centigrade's nose, forcing him to smell both farts and feet. He was holding on pretty hard too, by the looks of it. "Heh, thats it, Jake! Gas the crap out of him!"
1111111121221122112111111111112.title: Jake gets the heck outta there!

11111111212211221121111111111121.content: I growl quietly as Jake's repeated gas attacks start to take their toll on centigrade. I have to do something quick. I wait until his back is turned before taking off one of my shoes and sneaking up behind the two of them, ready to pounce.
11111111212211221121111111111121.title: You get him off

choices: Use the last of your Stench ability to try and get Jake off
Run back and think of something, quickly
111111112122112211211111111111211.content: I see you sneaking up to Jake with your fuming shoe, and I use my last telepathy. "Jake! Behind you!" Jake looks behind very quickly and, as he sees you sneaking up behind him, he slaps the shoe right out of your hand and out of the arena. "Yes! Take that!" I shout, as Jake continues to rip nasty farts on Centigrade's head, slowly chipping at his strength. You...
111111112122112211211111111111211.title: You warn Jake in time.

1111111121221122112111111111112111.content: I clench my fists, "fine. You don't want to sniff my shoe you stupid little rodent? Then you can sniff my foot instead!" I lift my socked foot up and press it into Jake's face. The smell makes him dizzy as he falls off of Centigrade. I stand over your pokemon with my foot in his face and laugh triumphantly. "Ha! Let's see you get out of this one. A minute later, Centigrade clears his head and walks over to me. I remove my putrid foot from your now incredibly dizzy Dewott's face and Centigrade sits down on iy. I walk back to my corner and taunt, "looks like this is the end for you!"
1111111121221122112111111111112111.title: Use the last of your Stench ability to try and ...

11111111212211221121111111111121112.content: I react quickly, hopping to the arena and exclaiming "No! It's not over yet!" I run into Centigrade, knocking him off of the now weak and dazed Jake, and sitting right on top of his face. I merely chuckled as I let out a completely silent and deadly fart in the Glaceon's face. I continued letting out eggy guffs into his face for a good minute or two before Jake clears his head, standing back up woozily and wiping his face. I hop back out of the arena, taunting "You were saying?" As Jake pinned Centigrade down. It was now Jake's turn to fart on the Glaceon.
11111111212211221121111111111121112.title: You manage to save Jake

111111112122112211211111111111211122.content: I grimace, there's absolutely nothing I can do at this point! I can't very well try to seduce you or your pokemon with my good looks, not when you're already wise to my tricks. And you're probably too focused on winning right now to care if I make a lewd remark or two. I can only watch in anger as Centigrade gets gassed more and more, his considerable strength fading with every minute. After ten minutes...
111111112122112211211111111111211122.title: Not so likely...

1111111121221122112111111111112111221.content: "Hah! Where's your cockiness now?" I say as Jake continues to gas Centigrade. "Looks like you'll be meeting a few of my pokemon up close and personal pretty soon!" I continue to taunt as Jake lets out a single, final toxic fart in the Glaceon's face,knocking him out. "And that's that. Take that." I smirk, taking off my hood.
1111111121221122112111111111112111221.title: Centigrade faints.

choices: One of your pokemon tortures me first.
11111111212211221121111111111121112211.content: I clench my teeth in frustration, not only did I lose, but now I have to take whatever humiliating torture you have planned for me! I take a deep breath to calm myself and say, "well, what are you waiting for? Get over here and torture me already. You've earned it for ruining my perfect streak."
11111111212211221121111111111121112211.title: I win

111111112122112211211111111111211122112.content: "Yes!" I say. I got my first win and I broke your winning streak. I send back Jake, thanking him for a good job, and I say "Oh, how the mighty have fallen. Let's start off with someone who you met a while ago." I throw the pokeball, and it lands right next to you. Flash the Jolteon comes out, and he looked mad. At you, more specifically. The smell was rancid, and it only got worse when he tackles you and put his paws right on your nose.
111111112122112211211111111111211122112.title: One of your pokemon tortures me first

1111111121221122112111111111112111221121.content: I gag, choke, and retch, but make no move to escape from your Jolteon's horrific paws. What point was there in trying to escape anyways? It's not like I can go anywhere. I decide to just take my beating like a man and sniff Flash's paws until you're satisfied. Although, with the way they smell, I probably won't last much longer before his stinky paws knkck me out!
1111111121221122112111111111112111221121.title: Continue

choices: You pass out...4 more to go.
1111111121221122112111111111112111221121.content: "Here's the deal, Xavier. You're sniffing each of my Pokemon, one by one, until you pass out 5 times. And truth be told, that was a good match. Because of that, I won't do anything to help them torture you." I stand back and watch as Flash switched to his BO, shifting his body until your nose was dangerously close to his awful, rancid pit.
1111111121221122112111111111112111221121.title: Continue

1111111121221122112111111111112111221121.content: Suddenly, he drops down, completely smothering my face in his swampy pit. I have no choice but to choke down huge amount of pit-stink as his body is blocking my mouth. I don't last long and my eyes flutter cl9sed as I pass out from the horrendous stench.
1111111121221122112111111111112111221121.title: You pass out...4 more to go.

1111111121221122112111111111112111221121.content: I chuckle, sending Flash back. "Nice job." I tell Flash, before putting him abck and grabbing the second pokeball. I tap you on the cheek, trying to get you to wake up. "Hey. Four more times, and we're done." You wake up, and I throw the pokeball out. It was Chance. The Chansey looked pretty neutral, but I give her the "go" sign, and she walks up towards you.
1111111121221122112111111111112111221121.title: Continue

1111111121221122112111111111112111221121.content: I prop myself up on my elbows to get a better look at my next tormentor and groan. This was the one who knocked Spectre out and I already know what she's going to do. My fears are confirmed as she sits down on my chest and shoves her grimy feet in my face. While I am disgusted beyond all belief, I sniff her feet since I don't really have any other options.
1111111121221122112111111111112111221121.title: Continue

1111111121221122112111111111112111221121.content: After another 5 minutes of this foot torture, with an occasional foot lick or two, you passed out again. "Three more. Hehe..." I chuckle, sending Chance back and I send out Aero, who perches on the ground, looking at you as I try to wake you up. Your eyes flutter as you wake back up, saying "Think of this as training for better resistance! This one's gonna be a doozy. And you know what he's going to do." Aero flaps his wings once in your direction to prove your suspicions.
1111111121221122112111111111112111221121.title: Continue

1111111121221122112111111111112111221121.content: The flap of his wings sends the horrific stench my way and I immediately start coughing. Suddenly, Aero wraps his wings around my body and clises the top off with his mouth. The stench is already overwhelming for me and he hasn't even started breathing yet. "Ugh, *cough* I can't believe poor delicate Gleam had to go through this..."
1111111121221122112111111111112111221121.title: Continue

1111111121221122112111111111112111221121.content: I watch you weakly squirming, and I say "Like the smell? ts going to, increase in potency right...about...now." Just as I say now, Aero begins to fill the rather small chamber with his nasty, sour breath.
1111111121221122112111111111112111221121.title: Continue

choices: Change of plans. You're both going to torture me.
1111111121221122112111111111112111221121.content: My sympathies for Gleam only grow as Aero pumps the small chamber full of his disgusting breath. Out of everything you've put me through so far, this is probably the worst! I hardly even last a minute in here before I pass out from the toxic stink. I wake up sometime later only to see both you and Jake looming over me.
1111111121221122112111111111112111221121.title: Continue

choices: You pass out after a while
1111111121221122112111111111112111221121.content: I want actually feeling gassy, which came as a shock. I was almost always gassy. But I sit back and watch as Jake chuckles, sitting right on your face and letting out a nauseating gas blast in your face. "Jake's gonna have a little fun with you, and I don't really feel like helping him right now. He can handle it on his own." The gassy Dewott continues to fart on you,mother eggy stench washing over your face and making you queasy.
1111111121221122112111111111112111221121.title: Jake's Turn!

choices: You smirking over me. I'm not done yet!
1111111121221122112111111111112111221121.content: My body is so weak from all of your other pokemon that I hardly last long at all before Jake's noxious farts knock me out. Apparently that didn't satisfy him though, because I wake up right where I left off, under his ass. As soon as he feels me wake, he starts blasting me full of farts again. This time I last a little longer (about three minutes) but the horrific stench still knocks me out. I wake up yet again to see...
1111111121221122112111111111112111221121.title: You pass out quickly

choices: You notice something before you leave
1111111121221122112111111111112111221121.content: You saw the ring empty, and most of the crowd had left. The ref heads over to you, telling you that the match was over and you had lost. You stood up, brushed yourself off, and began to leave.
1111111121221122112111111111112111221121.title: An empty ring

1111111121221122112111111111112111221121.content: I groan, clutching ny head. All of those knockouts really did a number on me. I make a mental note to start training as soon as possible for a rematch, because even though I lost I have to admit that the battle was pretty fun.
1111111121221122112111111111112111221121.title: You leave normally

112.content:
Name: Carl

Gender: Male

Sexual Orientation: Heterosexual (However he can be raped by a male or female if he loses)

Appearance: Carl is 5'9'', 150 lbs., has short dark hair, light skin, and is a bit on the scrawny side. He wear a button down collared blue office shirt. He wears black slacks and comfortable black loafers.

12512.content: I watched as you strode in, and chuckled. "Well, another opponent for me and my friend here?" It was then they you noticed the Dewott standing right next to me. He was crossing his arms and scoffing at the both of you. "Now, Jake. Don't piss them off before the match even started." He growled at me, and I was forced to send him back into his pokeball. "Sorry for the rude introduction. The name's Kyle. What's yours?"
12512.title: Or maybe we should kick it and have a chat first?

125121.content: I gave a small salute. "I'm Torr, it's nice to meet you!" As I aporoached to offer a handshake, Paulina jumped in front of me, ready to brawl. "Oh, cool it you. We'll start soon." After shooing her away, I resume my approach and offer you a handshake. "Seems like both of our partners are raring to go. This should be a fun match!"
125121.title: Answer

1251211.content: Hmm. You were a lot nicer than I thought. Your Pokemon, on the other hand...not so much. I approached you, smirking as you held out your hand. You didn't seem like the person that'd play a trick on me, so I grasped your hand, shaking it thoroughly. "Well hey there Torr. Let's cut right to the chase now, shall we?" I headed back to my side and climbed out of the arena, taking out my first pokeball. "Let's get this party started! Jake, go!" The Dewott from before materializes from the red and white ball, chuckling as he looks raring for a fight.
1251211.title: Accept my handshake

12512111.content:
I return to my side of the arena as well, where Paulina was waiting for me. "Alright, do your best girl!" After an enthusiastic high five, Paulina launched herself into the ring, and straight at Jake.

For a medium sized pokemon, Paulina was surprisingly strong and hefty; and a head on collision with her never ends well for her prey. That being said, Paulina barrels into Jake, attempting to blitz him to the ground for a pin. The high energy of the feminine frog makes her body odor reek, which would be best noticed after that strong slam. To pin him, Paulina attempts to shove and hold down his arms, and stretch her rancid feet into his face to weaken him.
12512111.title: Send out your first Poké!

choices: Oh Arceus that reeks! She gets off!
You do something to stop it!
125121111.content: Jake watched Paulina's every move, waiting for the right time. He had some pretty bad BO as well, but for him, it's what's bubbling inside of him that can really do some damage. However, Paulina dodged just as Jake lunged for her, and soon enough my Dewott was pinned. I still had that little smirk on my face, even more so when you saw Jake grabbing his shell, ripping a good, nasty one in it and forcing it onto the little frog's nose.
125121111.title: Is Jake pinned?

1251211112.content: Being one of the team's aces, Paulina expected a trick like this. The raunchy smell weakened her, but not enough to stop her assault. After knocking away the shell with a powerful strike from one of her finger claws, she grabs Jake's arms and slams then down above his head. She then begins a deadly breath attack, burping and blowing inches away from his nose as fast as she could.
1251211112.title: She knocks it away

choices: She gets off and I get back to my side
She gets off, but not before knocking Jake out
12512111122.content: Jake begins to squirm and struggle, becoming weaker with each putrid exhalation he smells. "Nngh!" I groan. I doubt Mindlink would do anything, and Trip would just make her fall on top of Jake. Wait...I still have stench! I rushed in, taking off a shoe and forcing the opening on Paulina's nose. "Get off of Jake!" I shout
12512111122.title: Do something to help?

125121111221.content:
The unexpected rush of smelly shoe interrupts Paulina's attacks, forcing her off of Jake! However, Jake wasn't looking so well; another moment or two of deadly burps and Jake may have been down for the count.

After a moment of staggering, Paulina comes to her senses, and charges at Jake with renewed vigor. She wants to finish the job quickly, so she jumps last second to try and get her noxious feet in Jake's face.
125121111221.title: She gets off and I get back to my side

1251211112211.content: Nope! Before Paulina reaches Jake, I send him back, sending the poor frog careening towards the ropes. It snags her and the falls backwards. I winked at her and said "Too bad, you'll just have to wait for a bit before you get Jake. For now..." I put Jake's pokeball back and took out another one, tossing it high into the air. Out comes my Aerodactyl with a piercing screech. I knew only one of these kindas of switches was allowed, but I needed Jake in case something were to arise.
1251211112211.title: Does Paulina hit the mark?

choices: Does Paulina ground the fossil flyer?
12512111122111.content:
The disappointment on Paulina's face was intense; at least, until she saw the Aerodactyl come out.

I chuckled a bit, seeing her get so excited. "I hope you don't think that flying up there will give you the upper hand. Paulina is a frog pokemon, after all."

Merely seconds after saying my piece did Paulina launch herself in the air with her powerful legs. Snatching onto the Aerodactyl's tail, the antagonistic amphibian began to try and drag the Aerodactyl down.

"I'm new to stink fighting, but this trick is one Paulina has practised many tines against our regular contenders. She may be part fighting type, but flyers won't keep her down!"
12512111122111.title: Anti Air Amphibian

125121111221111.content: I smile with content as I watched Paulina grab onto Aero's tail and try to pull him down. This was exactly what I wanted her to do. "Aero! Up!" His wings were actually rather strong, meaning he could fly really high up. And that he did. Now, if Paulina happened to let go, it would be a painful drop to the floor. I turned to you and smirked. "Let's see just how resilient that Pokemon of yours is...." My Aerodactyl then begins to flap his wings madly at the ground, sending massive gusts of rancid wind blowing in Paulina's direction!
125121111221111.title: Does Paulina ground the fossil flyer?

1251211112211111.content:
The disgusting gusts made Paulina wince, but she wouldn't back down; not yet at least. Instead of trying to yank the Aerodactyl down by force, Paulina flipped her disgustingly slimey and dangerously smelly feet in Aero's face.

"Oh man, good thinking Pauli! Too much of that stink and he'll be forced to make an emergency landing!"
1251211112211111.title: How's that?!

12512111122111111.content: My eye begins to twitch. This Pokemon of yours is going to be a real hassle to handle...but then I get an idea. I gesture for Aero to do something, and I hoped he heard me. Sadly, he doesn't, and slowly lowers himself back to the ground where he can yank the ripe, cheesy and sweaty frog feet from his face. "Dammit!" I shout, as Aero and Paulina get into a little ground scuffle.
12512111122111111.title: Continue

125121111221111111.content:
Down on the ground was not where an Aerodactyl belongs, and given Paulina's speed and strength, it's not long until Aero is stuck with his face under Paulina's rump. With all the movement, the frog is drenched in sweat, making her bottom an intolerable stink trap!

Suffice it to say, Aero passed out quickly, as Paulina rubbed her musky bottom on his face. She looked like she was beginning to run out of energy though...

"Sorry that went so quickly, but Paulina is my deadliest combatant. She won't fall for any shenanigans!"

Looking the frog over after my boasting however, I became worried. If I don't play this next match up smartly, she'll fall quickly...
125121111221111111.title: Paulina dominates!

1251211112211111111.content: I'm starting to get mad at this Toxicroak. I sent Aero back and took out a third pokeball. I was losing 2-4, but I could come back with this! I shout "Come on out Chance! Take this frog down!" My Chansey bursts from the pokeball, looking happy to see another Pokemon to "have fun" with. "Go ahead, Paulina...try to attack." I say, with an ominous tinge in my voice.
1251211112211111111.title: Time for your next choice.

12512111122111111111.content: "Pauli, be careful. You're low on energy, and I don't like his tone." Paulina looks at me and nods, before approaching the Chansey. She could smell the cheery pokemon without even getting close. Instead of attacking full frontal force, Paulina leaps into the air once again, over the Chansey's head, and aims a landing on top of Chance. She's aiming a landing straight for Chance's face, feet extended.
12512111122111111111.title: More acrobatics

choices: Paulina's too weak, and Chance wants a foot stool!
125121111221111111111.content: I didn't even have to do much, Chance knew what to do. She dodged the Toxicroak's flying kick and grabbed the frog with her nubby arms, pulling the Pokemon in for a stinky hug. The BO of the Chansey wasn't as bad as the stench emanating from her feet, but it was still pretty putrid.
125121111221111111111.title: What next?

1251211112211111111112.content:
Caught in the mighty hug, Paulina was far too weak to struggle out, and was only growing weaker by the second. I feared it may be over for her, but a last minute strategy came to mind. "Pauli, your tongue! Use your tongue!"

Paulina inmediately knew what I meant, and gave Chance a big, long, stinky lick starting under her mouth and up to above her nose, lingering on her nostrils for a stronger effect.
1251211112211111111112.title: One last resort

choices: She's out! It's 3-3 now! But I'm at a disadvantage since Jake's weak.

She slammed the Toxicroak into the ground and wiped the stinky, sour saliva from her face. She then slapped her huge, smelly feet into Paulina's face, smothering her in pure rancid odor as she takes a seat!

125121111221111111111221.content:
Already reeling from that BO hug, there was nothing Paulina could do to stop the oncoming foot assault. I watched in horror as Chance turned Paulina's face into a smelly foot rag! "Ewww, no way..." I muttered.

It didn't take long for Paulina's will to break, and only a minute or so of constant foot smelling made Paulina KO.

Shaking my head and returning Paulina to her ball, I decide to send out Adelaide the Eevee as her replacement. Hopefully she would be fast enough to outrun and defeat this Chansey...

Making the first move, Adelaide runs circles around Chance, attempting to give her a huff of paw stink.
125121111221111111111221.title: Down goes the ace!

choices: Adelaide gets to her feet quick enough to counter!

Chance then closes the distance, ready to give her the same treatment as Paulina!

12512111122111111111122111.content: While Adelaide was full of spunk, and very fast, she was not very stink resistant. Unable to get up in time or resist the Chansey while on her back, Adelaide ended up with a face full of rancid, cheesy Chansey feet. Struggle as she may, she couldn't get out from under the physically stronger pokemon, and her efforts for struggling only tired her out further.

The Chansey began to smother Adelaide, pushing on her stomach and forcing her to take huge whiffs of the cheesy stench. She even poked part of her foot into the poor Eevee's mouth, invading her mouth with the taste of dirty feet. Needless to say, Adelaide passed out within a minute.
125121111221111111111221111.title: Smother time

1251211112211111111112211111.content:
Returning Adelaide to her ball, I grew worried. This Chansey was a force to be reckoned with! With two pokemon remaining, I would have to be very careful. There was no way my Tyrogue would be able to take down this tyrant, so I send out my trusted partner Ginta.

"Careful out there bud, this one is going to be a tough opponent." Ginta nods, before turning invisible, leaving only the red zig-zag of his belly viewable. Like this, he waits for Chance to approach.
1251211112211111111112211111.title: Two to go

choices: You're not falling for that again!
12512111122111111111122111111.content: Chance merely stood there watching the zigzag, intently waiting for Ginta to approach. Due to her little She wasn't really much of a runner, she usually waited for her prey to approach. Due to her rather large build it'd be disadvantageous for her to run. So I decided to stand back and watch. "Come on, why don't you try and hit Chance?" I taunted.
12512111122111111111122111111.title: Continue

125121111221111111111221111111.content:
I chuckled. "No way. Neither of us are falling for that trick again! In fact, we won't have to!" Because Ginta has such deadly smelly breath, his tongue also reeks just as bad. Due to the strange nature of Kecleons, his invisibility also made his tongue invisible; the only visible part on his body was that red zig-zag on his chest. Laying on his belly, Ginta flattens his chest to the ground, concealing his stripe. Next, he extends his super long tongue, licks a big stripe up Chance's face, and snaps his tongue back in quickly!

"Ha, like this, Ginta can safely take your tyrant of a Chansey down!"
125121111221111111111221111111.title: You're not falling for that again!

1251211112211111111112211111111.content: I looked very confused as I watched Chance recoil, then reel back and gag from an unknown smell. That must've been Ginta! I can't do anything, since Mindlink won't do me much good and Trip only works when the opponent is standing! Even I don't know where that sneaky Kecleon is! I can only watch as my poor Chansey is licked with Ginta's stinky tongue over and over again. Soon enough, she's weak, but finally begins to walk aimlessly forward, looking for the stinky assailant.

As she walks, Chance stumbles into Ginta; literally! Chance quickly falls under the onslaught of smells, unable to protect herself fully from Ginta's attacks.

I start by throwing a flashbang between the two pokemon, Ginta protects himself from the flash. Then, I activate trip, and since Vick was dashing, she was sure to be down. 12512111122111111111122111111111121.content: The next few moments were like a blur. I open my mouth to speak but no words come out. Panicking, I attempt to use my Mindlink, trying to tell Vick to shoot off spores from the top of his flower. I must say, thank you for the challenge. you're my first Opponent here, you know. It'll be nice to see how our babies do. So, what's your name sweetie?" 1553.content:
This is the double battle section of the tournament. In which one on one or two on two trainer battles occur with a two pokemon fighting on each side.

The one on one fights are fairly straightforward. They're the same as before except two pokemon can be out at once for each trainer.

The two on two fights are a bit more complicated, but not by much. Each trainer can bring a maximum of three pokemon instead of six and every ttainer participating must use the same amount of pokemon. Like in the standard matches, a trainer can posess more than three pokemon but they can onle battle using three of them. Trainer duos can both be controlled by the same author or one from two different authors. Other than that, the same rules apply.
1553.title: Double Battle Mode!

info.brief_description: Another version of my tournament story. This time with people!
info.description:
Alrighty then, here we are once again with yet another version of my Smelly Pokemon Tournament series! This time however, we're throwing humans in the mix! Combat will be pretty much the same as before, knock out all of your opponent's pokemon to win using various smells but there are a few differences. The point of view for this story will be from humans instead of pokemon. More specifically, the point of view of trainers who use their foul-smelling pokemon to battle each other.

Now, the rules of this tournament are as follows:

Pokemon teams may be made up of any number of pokemon, however, there is a maximum of six per battle. In addition, a challenger is not allowed to use more pokemon on their team than the one they challenge. Battles will be based off of whoever has the least amount of pokemon on their team. For example: If someone has four pokemon but the challenger only has two, the battle will be 2v2.

Battles will continue until one trainer is out of usable pokemon, the winner is then allowed to have their way with the loser as long as what they do is in line with story rules and author preference.

Trainers who win may take their opponents to a more private area if they so wish. However, they are not allowed to keep them for more than 48 hours. (story time, not real time)

For this story only, the stench stats will be capped at Deadly, there are no multiples of said stat.

Since this is a sort of alternate timeline/universe/world thing, characters from the other tournament stories cannot be included. Well, the sort of can, but they aren't the exact same pokemon in the other stories.

Since trainers are the main characters, bios for pokemon will not include personal info about said pokemon. Only their name, gender, stats, species, and abilities.

Battles are fought using stink, such as farts, feet, bad breath, body odor, and butt-stink.

Sex is allowed, but only as a way to mess with a fallen opponent

No killing your opponent or their pokemon

No scat, watersports, inflation, diapers, or any fetishes along those lines. However, anything that can be traced to a pokemon move or ability is alright.

A pomemon's abilities do not have to be listed. They can have any abilities as long as you can logically argue why theywould have such a power. So no ice types using hypnosis or anything like that.

And finally, Trainer Buffs:

Every trainer gets to choose up to three buffs that they can use during battle, each one has it's own limitations and advantages. Keep in mind that the list is still in progress so if you think of a cool trainer ability, let me know and I'll see about adding it to the list! The current list is as follows...


Mesmerism: The trainer is able to use hypnosis on a single enemy pokemon per battle. It may also be used on trainers after a match ends.

Stench: the trainer smells foul as well as their strongest pokemon, allowing them to strike an enemy as well, but only three times per match. In addition, pokemon can not be knocked out by the trainer, no matter how foul they are, but they can be weakened to the point where a pokemon can finish them in a single blow.

Attractive: The trainer's good looks distract the enemy trainers and their pokemon, allowing for an unstoppable reversal in any situation. Can only be used twice per match.

Trip: The trainer has the ability to telekinetically shove the opponent's pokemon to the ground. Can control whether they fall backwards or forwards. Usable up to two times per match.

Resurrect: Usable once per match. The trainer may revive the pokemon at the price of one of their other pokemon.

Paralyze: The trainer can hinder the opponent's pokemon by paralyzing up to three body parts. Can only be used once per match.

Grocer: Trainer has the ability to hand out berries. Either for boosting stink resistance or as a cure for status effects.

Predict: Can periodically read the other trainer's mind, to see future moves. Can only predict two moves of each enemy pokemon.

Silence: Has the ability to momentarily stop the opposing trainer from communicating. Can only be used twice per battle and wears off once a pokemon on either side faints.

Pin-point: Trainer has the ability to examine the opponents to find weaknesses

Horn Dog: Can make obscene comments or gestures, distracting enemy pokemon and trainers. Can only be used three times per match.

Flashbang: The trainer throws out a light emmiting object that blinds the opponent and their pokemon. Can be used twice per battle.

Mindlink: The trainer can secretly send orders to their pokemon via telepathy. Can be used three times per battle.

And a new feature: Items! Items are held objects that may be used by a pokemon in battle. The number of usgaes varies but only half of your pomemon team can have an item and if you have an odd number of pokemon, it's rounded down. The list for items is:

Choice Band- Worn on the neck or on the waist. "Activating" it drastically increases the level of one stink, but also decreases every other stink.

Lum Berry- One time status remover. Can be held in the paw or in a bag. Only one can be held.

Mega Stone- Only one per team. Must actually be able to mega evolve before they can use it. If they don't have a mega evolution, they can't have a mega stone. When used (once per match), they mega evolve and their stink increases GREATLY

Max Revive: May only be used once per match, if a pokemon holding this faints, they are automatically revived.

Psy Amulet: May be used twice per match, can make one psychic based attack completely unavoidable.

Scope Lens: Can be used twice per match. Will make the next attack from the holder almost impossible to evade or counter.
